pageProduct.name: Travacalm Travel Sickness Natural Tablets 10
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Travacalm Natural contains ginger (zingiber officinale), a traditional natural treatment for nausea and vomiting. The oils that ginger contains appear to relax the intestinal tract in addition to mildly depressing the central nervous system. Recent clinical studies confirm the effectiveness of ginger in the prevention of travel sickness and the relief of nausea (including morning sickness). Travacalm Natural does not cause drowsiness.

Travacalm Natural is ideal for those who prefer natural treatments. It can be used in children over the age of two, but professional advice is recommended for children between the ages of two and six. If symptoms persist seek medical advice.

Warnings

Always read the label. Follow directions for use. If symptoms persist talk to your healthcare professional. This medicine may not be right for you. Read the warnings before purchase.

Ingredients

Each tablet contains ginger 500mg. Does not contain lactose or wheat starch.

Directions

Directions: Adults - 1 or 2 tablets (Maximum of 4 tablets in 24 hours). Children 8-12 years - Half to one tablet (maximum of 2 tablets in 24 hours).
